entry.title: QuickBoard 1.3.1
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • The "Override administrator settings" control is no longer enabled automatically when making changes on the device. In previous versions this caused EMM settings to be unexpectedly ignored.

entry.title: Datalogic Launcher 1.6.0
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support packages with multiple launchable activities.
  • The "Override administrator settings" control is no longer enabled automatically when making changes on the device. In previous versions this caused EMM settings to be unexpectedly ignored.

Corrected Defects​

  • Allowed Packages configuration is disabled when EMM override is disabled.
  • When connected to an external display from a Smart Dock, Launcher now correctly exits the device lockdown. This allows apps to be launched from an external desktop.

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.12.2
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support for application launch on external display with cradle insertion

Corrected Defects​

  • Enterprise Battery Saver Profiles
    • It is no longer required to specify CPU/GPU frequency and Maximum Download Rate
    • Maximum Download Rate is now correctly applied
  • Corrected Mobile Data Roaming Enable for Android 15 (also requires firmware update)

entry.title: Datalogic Logger 1.5.0
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • The "Override administrator settings" control is no longer enabled automatically when making changes on the device. In previous versions this caused EMM settings to be unexpectedly ignored.
  • Added support for 16 KB virtual page sizes (for Android 15).

Corrected Defects​

  • The contents summary for an archive listing displays "Empty" if no module contents are present.

entry.title: Datalogic SoftSpot 3.3.0
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • The "Override administrator settings" control is no longer enabled automatically when making changes on the device. In previous versions this caused EMM settings to be unexpectedly ignored.

Corrected Defects​

  • App is forced to launch only on the device display. Operation on an external display is not supported and attempts to launch from an external display will be redirected to the device display.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.3
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.3 is now available. This new release is a hotfix to address an issue that was preventing some firmware files from being uploaded to Studio.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.3 is now available. This new release is a hotfix to address an issue that was preventing some firmware files from being uploaded to Studio.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed issue where some Memor 10 Android 10 firmwares were unable to be validated
  • Bound redis server to localhost

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.9.1
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • The "Override administrator settings" control is no longer enabled automatically when making changes on the device. In previous versions this caused EMM settings to be unexpectedly ignored.

Corrections​

  • Corrected auto-focus behavior when not enabled.

entry.title: WorkDesk 1.0.2
entry.content:
Corrections​

  • Fixed "Use custom wallpaper" setting to allow setting custom wallpaper.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.2
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.2 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.2 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added WorkDesk App to Mobility Suite options
  • Added support for Joya Smart
  • Added support for Android 15 on Memor 12 and Memor 17
  • Added POWER keycode to the input section of the Key Remapping page

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed issue with the Enterprise Enrollment and Snap OCR pages not properly linking to their documentation
  • Fixed issue with changing the logo for the Launcher application on an already saved profile
  • Fixed issue with the Key Remapping page where some apps were not correctly being recognized in import/edit cases
  • Fixed issue with the Key Remapping page where key action settings were not saving properly

entry.title: WorkDesk 1.0.1
entry.summary: Provides a desktop experience when a device is inserted into a Smart Dock with an attached external display.
entry.content:
Provides a desktop experience when a device is inserted into a Smart Dock with an attached external display.

New features​

  • Desktop shortcuts
  • Taskbar with Apps Menu and status icons
  • Configuration of all UI elements (desktop, wallpaper, shortcuts, taskbar)

entry.title: Datalogic Android SDK 1.46
entry.summary: Datalogic Android SDK 1.46 is now available.
entry.content:
Datalogic Android SDK 1.46 is now available.

The latest update to the Datalogic SDK introduces a broad set of new features and improvements focused on enhancing device flexibility, expanding scanning capabilities, and strengthening enterprise integration.

Key additions include the Camera Wedge Always-On mode, allowing continuous scanning when the camera wedge is active, and the new CameraWedgePreviewManager class, which provides a live preview interface while the feature is running. The Auto Scan Trigger system has been extended with a new CUSTOM_RANGE option, offering greater control over scan sensitivity, while cradle functionality now supports SoHo cradles with updated properties and thermal protection handling.

To further improve power management, the SDK adds a PowerStatus notification system and refines the Enterprise Battery Saver, now supporting rate control in bps. Several new display management options have also been introduced, including brightness range limits, facedown detection.

For users leveraging Desktop Mode, new properties now allow control over the visibility of hotseat in dual screen mode.

Finally, for security, the new APP_INFO_HIDDEN property restricts access to system settings via the App Info shortcut, while the EXTRA_SYSTEM_FIRMWARE_UPGRADE_WIPE_ESIM_PROFILES flag enables secure eSIM profile handling during system upgrades. Additional enhancements include Item Tracking APIs, SOS button support, new OCR format options (TD2, MRVA, MRVB).

You can access the documentation here.

Enhancements​

  • Updated DLScreensaver package name to com.datalogic.settings.datalogicscreensaver.
  • Added a documentation warning for preventing installation of a new formatter project from client app's storage.
  • Added CAMERA_WEDGE_ENABLE_ALWAYS_ON to manage the availability of scan mode to always on when the camera wedge is active.
  • Added CameraWedgePreviewManager class for setting up a preview that will be shown when the camera wedge feature is running (only when no barcode is shown).
  • Added new option CUSTOM_RANGE in AutoScanTriggerRange and properties for configuring a custom range for the autoscan feature.
  • Added SoHo-supported cradle's properties and classes.
  • Removed unsupported methods getDontKeepActivities(), getBackgroundProcessLimit(), and getDisableGoldCluster().
  • Updated download rate limitation to bps in EnterpriseBatterySaver.
  • Added Item Tracking APIs.
  • Added battery LED documentation for smart charging and battery issue behavior.
  • Updated relevant APIs to reference the commercial name of Joya Smart instead of project name SoHo.
  • Updated cradle property: CUSTOM_AREA -> CUSTOM_AREA_BASE.
  • Removed enableLedOnLockUnlock() method from DLCradleManager class.
  • CradleManager shall reject de-registering a listener if the device doesn't support the feature that triggers that event.
  • Added a new intent extra EXTRA_SYSTEM_FIRMWARE_UPGRADE_WIPE_ESIM_PROFILES to system upgrade intent to wipe the eSIM profiles.
  • Added the possibility to scale the preview when installing it.
  • Added hotseat visibility control in dual screen mode.
  • Added new APP_INFO_HIDDEN property to restrict the user from accessing Settings application from App Info shortcut.
  • Added PowerStatus notification system to notify the user about the current power status of the device.
  • Added intent extra EXTRA_CRADLE_FAILURE_THERMAL_PROTECTION_POGO for thermal protection failure on pogo pins.
  • Added intents ACTION_TROLLEY_DEVICE_CORRECTLY_INSERTED and ACTION_TROLLEY_DEVICE_EXTRACTED to detect trolley insertion/extraction.
  • Added SOS button feature support.
  • Added 3 new OCR format options:
    • OCR_TD2_ENABLE
    • OCR_MRVA_ENABLE
    • OCR_MRVB_ENABLE
  • Added new properties SCREEN_BRIGHTNESS_RANGE_MIN and SCREEN_BRIGHTNESS_RANGE_MAX to support backlight range limit configuration.
  • Added new property SCREEN_FACEDOWN_DETECTOR_ENABLE to support facedown detector configuration.

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.12.1
entry.content:
Corrected Defects​

  • Hotfix to prevent failure when changing security settings on older firmware.

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.12.0
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Enhanced scanning controls
    • Camera Wedge
    • Cropped image result
    • Auto scan trigger
  • Screensaver controls
  • SOS Button controls
  • Power notification/LED controls
  • Extended support for User Interface controls
    • Show App Info
    • Show External screen hotseat

entry.title: QuickBoard 1.3.0
entry.content:
Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed crash if IME is started very early after device boot.

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.9.0
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Enhanced operation with web content from third party JavaScript SDK interfaces.
    • Exception messages are no longer generated.
    • Added interoperability control for third party SDKs.
  • Added Data Input features
    • Auto focus on first input field.
    • Show/Hide virtual keyboard on auto focus.
  • Extended Injection Command features
    • Command can also be filtered on URL (in addition to head/body keyword).
    • Added Zoom command function.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.7.0
entry.content:
Corrected Defects​

  • Starting the service (for silent deploy) after the UI activity was in the background would fail. Now it only fails if another profile is already being processed.
  • Inflating TAR profile could fail if file is very large (more than 2 GB).
  • Profile downloads could fail if app is placed in the background during the transfer.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.1 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.1 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added support for Memor 30/30X and Memor 35/35X A15 devices
  • Added PAC file support for Studio application proxy configuration

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed issue with the Add packages section on the Datalogic Launcher page
  • Fixed issue where Studio actions would fail if host PC was not connected to the internet
  • Fixed issue where A15 OTA files were unable to be added to the Firmware Update page

entry.title: Aladdin for CODiScan 3.7.0
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.7.0 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.7.0 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Improved Aladdin keyboard user interface.

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed bug preventing physical keyboard input when Aladdin keyboard was active.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.6.3
entry.content:
Corrected Defects​

  • Hotfix to work with Android 15 on new devices.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.0 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.6.0 is now available. This new release contains enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

Enterprise Enrollment ✨​

  • Now supports Android Enterprise Enrollment, allowing seamless integration with enterprise mobility management (EMM) solutions.

Miscellaneous​

  • Added support for the Memor 30 and Memor 35.
  • Lowered minimum QuickBoard keyboard size from 150dp to 30dp.

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed issue where Quickboard height was not reset when the page was removed and added
  • Fixed issue where all items in a bundle array were selected on profile load
  • Fixed issue with problematic in OTA file names
  • Fixed issue where Quickboard config file was not removed in some cases
